channel.title: The problem with this forum
channel.description:
Moderators with a god complex who are so damn insecure they feel the need to lock every thread. SOMETIMES IT'S FUN TO BREAK THE RULES 'KAY?
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=356325.40 <--- WHY WOULD YOU LOCK THIS THREAD? IT WAS PROVIDING LULZ.
in b4 this thread gets locked
in after mitb.com produces no worthwhile (unlocked) threads, no humorous memes, and has a stupid rep system.
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/34ou2s8.jpg[/img]

item.title: The problem with this forum
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“Java Ownz U, post:48, topic:270901”][quote author=cooper link=topic=357516.msg2736739#msg2736739 date=1239089457]

The problem with this forum is it sucks cock no matter what you do with it because almost everyone here is retarded.

I would like to take you up on that if you’re willing to bet.

  1. This forum cannot possibly suck cock, it is physically impossible. That’s like saying you had sexual intercourse with the browser firefox.
  2. I guarantee you that many of the users here have IQs above 80, with 79 and below being considered mentally impaired. As you should know before you throw around accusations, there are other factors, but I’d bet that many users here are not affected by them. I will not speak for the Moparscape forums as I do not actively participate there.

[It appears the odds are in my favour.]
[/quote]

I can’t believe you took the time to do that to prove me wrong when I couldn’t give a fuck.[/quote]
40 seconds isn’t much time.

Read full topic

item.title: The problem with this forum
item.dc:creator: @Wrauld Wrauld
item.description:
@Wrauld wrote:

[quote=“Niall, post:31, topic:270901”][quote author=Stork link=topic=357516.msg2732576#msg2732576 date=1238834429]
Fine? Brah this forum is boring as fuck, it’s a miracle anybody uses it at all. You have per day like what, 15 active members? I’m sure most of the irc users don’t even bother posting here most of the time because let’s face it, why would they? The IRC is hardly moderated, everybody gets along, and lulz are had regularly.
[/quote]

That’s what IRC is suppose to be for, though.

the man has a point, i just cant be fucked to join the IRC most of the time anymore

It’s not that hard to get a decent IRC client to autojoin to servers/channels.

If I joined irc, I would make everyone leave.

Or you would be banned. :|[/quote]

My point exact.

Read full topic
